data.name: Gothic wa Mahou Otome "Deathsmiles" Respect Arrange Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This soundtrack includes music for the DLC of Deathsmiles I・II.
The arrangements by Daisuke Matsumoto, the composer of "Gothic wa Mahou Otome".
